name: Teva Original Dorado Sandals - Men's
description:
Strap into a classic with a throwback to one of Teva’s original designs. Combining the supportive straps of gladiator sandals with Teva’s proven construction, the Dorado offers the kind of comfort that never goes out of style.Quick drying straps are made from REPREVE® recycled polyester.Combination of hook-and-loop straps and a buckle closureStructured straps provide even support.Contoured EVA footbed.Grippy rubber soles.

        Sustainability
